title: Interprofessional Collaborative Learning in Healthcare: Applying Qualitative Research Based on Shared Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and core competencies related to job roles
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning design optimized for online real-time education environments using smartphones for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners will analyze interprofessional collaboration scenarios and derive at least three core conflict factors among healthcare professions
Learners will apply a five-stage framework for designing structured interprofessional learning (IPL) activities
Learners will propose interprofessional collaboration plans in project format based on real-world medical cases and incorporate peer feedback

resources: Coding Guidelines for Qualitative Research Analysis
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
